languages.text: По ящикам разложено странное самодельное оружие: ракета на палке, уродливое ружье в черно-белую шашку, ржавые топоры и кастеты.

traits.locale_text: По ящикам разложено странное самодельное оружие: ракета на палке, уродливое ружье в черно-белую шашку, ржавые топоры и кастеты.

languages.text: Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.
languages.original_text: По ящикам разложено странное самодельное оружие: ракета на палке, уродливое ружье в черно-белую шашку, ржавые топоры и кастеты.

traits.locale_text: Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.
Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.
Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.
Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.
Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.

languages.text: 棒のついたロケット、白黒のチェック模様が施されたセンスのない銃、サビついた斧、メリケンサック…数々の奇妙な即席武器が箱の上に置かれている。
languages.original_text: Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.

traits.locale_text: 棒のついたロケット、白黒のチェック模様が施されたセンスのない銃、サビついた斧、メリケンサック…数々の奇妙な即席武器が箱の上に置かれている。

languages.text: Una serie de extrañas armas improvisadas expuestas sobre unas cajas: un cohete con palo, un arma de fuego con un espantoso diseño a cuadros blancos y negros, hachas oxidadas y puños de acero.
languages.original_text: Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.

traits.locale_text: Una serie de extrañas armas improvisadas expuestas sobre unas cajas: un cohete con palo, un arma de fuego con un espantoso diseño a cuadros blancos y negros, hachas oxidadas y puños de acero.

languages.text: 板条箱上面随意扔着几把古怪的临时武器：一支捆在棍子上的火箭、一把丑陋的黑白格子枪、几柄生锈的斧头和几个黄铜指虎。
languages.original_text: Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.

traits.locale_text: 板条箱上面随意扔着几把古怪的临时武器：一支捆在棍子上的火箭、一把丑陋的黑白格子枪、几柄生锈的斧头和几个黄铜指虎。

languages.text: D'étranges armes improvisées sont posées sur les caisses : une fusée attachée à un bâton, un pistolet recouvert d'un motif à damier de mauvais goût, des haches rouillées et des cestes.
languages.original_text: Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.

traits.locale_text: D'étranges armes improvisées sont posées sur les caisses : une fusée attachée à un bâton, un pistolet recouvert d'un motif à damier de mauvais goût, des haches rouillées et des cestes.

languages.text: Merkwürdige improvisierte Waffen liegen auf den Kisten: eine Rakete an einem Stock, eine hässliche, schwarz-weiß karierte Pistole, rostige Äxte, Schlagringe.
languages.original_text: Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.

traits.locale_text: Merkwürdige improvisierte Waffen liegen auf den Kisten: eine Rakete an einem Stock, eine hässliche, schwarz-weiß karierte Pistole, rostige Äxte, Schlagringe.

languages.text: Kasaların üzerinde tuhaf, eğreti silahlar duruyor: Bir sopaya bağlı bir roket, siyah beyaz ekoseli çirkin bir silah, paslı baltalar ve pirinç muşta.
languages.original_text: Strange improvised weapons are laid out on top of the crates: a rocket on a stick, an ugly black-and-white chequered gun, rusty axes, and brass knuckles.
